X-VoiceMessageTranscription: Hi, how are you? This is Ahmed from the Finance beauty team. I report to Judy Mann and Eddie Farhad. I just wanted to ask you in regards on the matter of the Christopher wrongful booking of the 50,000 came last month. I just wanted to ask has it been reversed yet or is like any updates on your side? I'd really appreciate any updates from you. Thank you so much. Appreciate it.
